doc.previous: that in 1861 the impressionism painter Claude Monet joined the First Regiment of African Light Cavalry in Algeria where he stayed for two years
doc.after: that in defying Spanish dominance locals built a chapel at a higher elevation next to Fort Santa Cruz pictured in Oran Algeria
